description.value:
Wearer is immune to Mind-Mould unless they are a Psyker. Sealed, and Filtration Systems provide +40 to any Toughness Tests to resist harmful gases, +10 to resist extreme temperatures and being set on fire. inbuilt Rebreather lasts 5 hours before needing replacement. Can be worn over armour. If taking 5+ damage in a single round it becomes damaged and is no longer sealed.

Requirements

Max AG 40 whilst wearing. Likely protects against other similar particulates.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
